entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
